patterns.name: delegation-error-boundary
patterns.description: Error boundary pattern for delegation tools. Wrap child_agent.run() in try-catch. Catch Exception for all error types. Log with logger.error(msg, exc_info=True). Return dict with error=True, error_type, error_message, and empty result fields. Prevents child agent failures from crashing parent. Critical for parallel execution. Provides graceful degradation with structured error responses.
